reviewText: Received on time in brand new unopened condition as advertised,  my only complaint is that it says there is a pencil case enclosed which my grandson is looking for but it was NOT included. Why is this allowed to happenwhen the kids so look fotward for that item.
My child love this DVD and the best part is that it includes the music video of Pencil Case which you'll find in special features! My kids are obsessed with Pencil Case!!!! Love it!

This is a great collection of Bubble Guppies episodes perfect to get your child ready for back to school.  From picture day to teachers to science and more, there is a lot of fun to be had by the Bubble Guppies.  What is great though is this is perfect for when Bubble Guppies is not on tv or if your child wants to watch a specific episode.  The songs are cute and catchy and all the episodes are appropriate for your kids.  My kids love them from ages 3 to 7 years old. There is almost 2 hours of Bubble Guppies adventures going on.

Not really their fault. My daughter accidentally ordered this and instantly started playing it. Mind you she's only 18 months, so she can't do any of this on purpose, just accidentally bounced through the menus perfectly. And because she started streaming it instantly, there's no option for a refund, or to contact anybody for any kind of help. We already own all of these episodes, so this was just a giant waste of money.

My daughter has recently gotten into Bubble Guppies and she loves this DVD.  It has her favorite episode with Mr. Grumpfish as a substitute teacher and she watches it pretty much anytime she's in the backseat on her portable DVD player.  The songs are so infectious and the humor works on a level where both my daughter and I find it funny.  Of all the shows she watches, Bubble Guppies is probably the one I enjoy the most.  The episodes included on the DVD are "Get Ready For School," "Good Morning, Mr. Grumpfish," "Good Hair Day," "Check It Out," "Construction Psyched," and "The Moon Rocks."
My daughter loves it!!

The perfect video for any Bubble Guppies fan.  We initially purchased this for a flight to entertain our three year old who doesn't travel well - and it worked! For 2 hours and 18 minutes she was enthralled in Bubble Guppies land. We continue to watch this video regularly at home now as well. This video is really just 6 episodes from the show itself:

1. Get Ready For School
2. Good Morning, Mr. Grumpfish
3. Good Hair Day
4. Check It Out
5. Construction Psyched
6. The Moon Rocks

Overall, highly recommend for any kid who enjoys Bubble Guppies.

If you are on the fence because this contains episodes that they have already seen go ahead and get it. I am having enough trouble finding the seasons to purchase that is a handy dvd to have.

Very adorable video with scenes about the school bus, a little fish on his first day of school, I actually cried at that one...it shows a lot of aspects of school, how the Guppies felt when they started school. Super cute.

Great show for young kids.

My daughter loves Bubble Guppies.  She LOVES the songs and the cute little mermaids.  I'm trying to instill the value and excitement of school and education early and this DVD does a good job at explaining how fun and great going to school can be.  The DVD has a LOT of songs and my daughter is a very musical learner so if your child learns through music he/she will definitely love this.  I personally have a problem with some of the things because the bubble guppies are under water and they have scenes like going to the beach or other things that you clearly don't do under water and for me I look at the guppies and wonder "how can they be floating and 'swimming' mid air if they are not in the sea" or "how can they do an under water scene while they are still under water" but that's just me being an adult, lol.  Kids don't see it that way.  They are too wrapped up in the songs and learning the lesson of the episode.  It makes my daughter happy and she learns things like counting and the alphabet so I have no problem letting her watch it.

My girls (ages 4 and 7) love the Bubble Guppies and we have a ton of the episodes on our DVR, including all of the episodes from this DVD. They are always requesting the show. The show is great for its vivid colors and fun songs. It always has a positive message and teaches kids about a variety of things and occupations. You will probably find yourself with the catchy songs stuck in your head. The going outside song is the best.

This DVD contains six great episodes. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:
1. Get Ready For School - Avi is worried about starting school and the Bubble Guppies show how much fun school can be.
2. Good Morning, Mr. Grumpfish - Mr. Grumpfish looks after the kids while Mr. Grouper is at the dentist.
3. Good Hair Day - Gil gets his first haircut.
4. Check It Out - Gil needs to find his library card and gets magically transported inside his favorite books to look for it.
5. Construction Psyched - Goby loses a toy at a construction site.
6. The Moon Rocks - The Bubble Guppies visit a planetarium for a show.

Bonus Features
1. "Get Ready for School" Music Video
2. "Pencil Case" Music Video

Episode's:
1. Get ready for school!
2. Good morning, Mr. Grumpfish!
3. Good Hair Day!
4. Check it out!
5. Construction Psyched!
6. The Moon Rocks!

Very cute, educational show with awesome catchy songs(especially "Good Hair Day!"). This is one if the top liked shows in our house!!

6 Episodes under the blanket theme "Get Ready for School!"  I was so excited to find it since my daughter is starting 3K in a couple of weeks, and she loves Bubble Guppies--I thought maybe she could learn what school will be like.  I was disappointed to find out that the first episode is about school (great) and the rest are only very loosely connected.  The one about the substitute teacher is just a medley of songs featured in past episodes, although I guess you could consider them things they could learn about in school (colors, sun, seasons, etc.).  The other ones are about the library and getting a hair cut for picture day, episodes I have seen on TV.  My daughters are enjoying this collection, but if you are looking for something for school readiness, save your money and order just the single episode at the beginning of the collection (or DVR it for free on cable).  Can't help but feel the description was a bit misleading.
My 3 year old Grandson loves it !!!
